title: Analysis of the Impact of Changes in Incorrect Answer Formats in Online Learning Resources on Learning Outcomes

context.prior_knowledge: Basic concepts of economics education and understanding of social phenomena
context.additional_context: Economics education course for practitioners conducted in smartphone-based limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Analyze differences in conceptual understanding based on changes in incorrect answer-choice formats through pre-post tests
Critically evaluate the effectiveness of "Both X and Y" type incorrect answer choices
Propose improvements to educational materials based on experimental design results

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
